sentence.text: A plethora of human diseases are associated with mutations in the genes encoding human SLC26 transporters, including chondrodysplasias with varying severity in sulfate transmembrane transport (~50 mutations, 27 point mutations), congenital chloride-losing diarrhea in sperm capacitation (~70 mutations, 31 point mutations) and Pendred Syndrome or deafness autosomal recessive type 4 in regulation of pH (~500 mutations, 203 point mutations).
